patterns: Somebody is in a good mood 😊, wanna tell me what happened today?
Wow correct if my wrong but you look pretty happy! Tell me what's on your mind
Hmm what's got you all smiling today? 🧐. Share the details
So what can I help you with?
Hey you okay? I'm here to help as best as I can.
I'm here to listen to you, so you can tell me as much or little as you would like. Anything I can help you with?
